ValidationRule.description: Ensures that signed transaction CBOR is available when transaction is ready to send and approved
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISPICKVAL(Transaction_Status__c, 'Ready to send'), ISPICKVAL(Approved__c, 'Approved'), ISBLANK(Signed_Transaction_CBOR__c) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Transaction submission requires signed CBOR. Please rebuild and sign the transaction first.
